Description: This auction is for a 2016 Epiphone SG G-400 Worn edition. The Worn version differs from the standard G-400 in that it is painted with a satin finish instead of the super-glossy polyurethane. In terms of playability, this results in a slicker, faster neck than the typical Epiphone poly experience. This guitar is in pristine physical and aesthetic condition. The finish is unblemished and the hardware and electronics are maintained and functioning completely. Late this fall I performed a setup adjustment and restringing. It's got a fresh set of 9s on it and the action is quite low. There is one non-standard modification. To get some extra 'bite', I replaced the bridge pickup (originally an Epiphone Alnico Classic Plus) with an Epiphone T700 open coil humbucker. I'm the first and only owner. This has never been gigged and only played and recorded in my smoke-free home studio. I only ship to the continental US. I only accept PayPal payments. I ship in Epiphone boxes. Thank you for viewing!
Title: Epiphone SG G-400 Electric Guitar

NameValueList.Name: Modification Description
Value: Stock bridge pickup (Epiphone Alnico Classic Plus) replaced with an Epiphone 700T Open Coil Humbucker.
